attr.title: Crazy Cook
attr.desc: You have to cook burgers and throw them into the mouths of your busy customers before they lose their patience. Be cautious! Your customers have specific preferences. If you feed a vegetarian with beef, he will vomit it back at your face! Your goal is to earn enough money before the time expires. Cook fast and pass the test of a chef to become the best cook!
attr.inst: All files included and ready to run. Thanks to Skinner Space for the fantastic game and permission to distribute the files.
